channel.title: This will be my last question - help -
channel.description:
ok i have a few questions then i will never ask for help again.
1. How can i change max cash to 2billion 2.How can i choose the spawn location when new people first login ( i dont like fally ) 3. How can i change a teleport like fally to go to a new place ( the spawn place ) 4. where can i get anti mass? :confused: 5. on stats it says NRG under energy how can i edit that 6. Total lvl says gay lvl how can i edit that
ok after i have these questions answred ill never ask again [br][size=1]Posted on: August 13, 2007, 11:59:56 AM[/size][hr]could sum1 also try to connect to funscape.hopto.org please?
It says offline when i try to register it on mopar.
i have dun the port forward and everything else[br][size=1]Posted on: August 13, 2007, 12:02:50 PM[/size][hr]aw cmon pls help! :D

item.title: This will be my last question - help -
item.dc:creator: @_A-M #A-M
item.description:
@_A-M wrote:

[quote=“Taylor John0, post:2, topic:133256”]Triple postin n33b!

  1. GET A DIFFERENT SERVER, N33B
  2. CLIENT.JAVA I BELIEVE, JUST GET THE COORDX FOR WHERE YOU START, FIND IT, AND CHANGE IT, N33B
  3. FIND THE COORDX FOR THE TELE IN CLIENT.JAVA, N33B
  4. TRY GOOGLE, N33B
  5. SEARCH SOME FILES TILL YOU FIND IT, N33B
  6. TRY CLIENT.JAVA, N33B[/quote] wow dude, thats alot of N33BS!

Read full topic

item.title: This will be my last question - help -
item.dc:creator: @Wildcat_240 Wildcat_240
item.description:
@Wildcat_240 wrote:

Don’t Triple Post.

Let me be a little more SPECIFIC than the ass hole up there…

  1. Look in player.java, find something like: public int maxItemAmount = /*2000000000*/2147000000; the second number for you is probably 999999999, change that to 2147000000.

  2. Search in Player.java for something like: // initial x and y coordinates of the player heightLevel = 0; // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet teleportToX = 3218;//KittyScape Start teleportToY = 3219;//Kittyscape Start

  3. Search for the co-ords that the teleport currently takes you to in client.java, and change them. Simple Enough isn’t it.

  4. Add something like this to your current objects that you train on: case 2873: if(actionTimer == 0) {<<Leave this sendMessage("You train Attack !"); actionTimer = 53;<<Change this setAnimation(2068); addSkillXP((100*playerLevel[0]), 0); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

Note that you don’t have to add the entire thing…just the actiontimer.

  1. Search for NRG in client.java and change it…

  2. Same as above, search for gay level and change it to whatever you want.

By the way Taylor John0, If you think you are being funny, You aren’t. You are just being immature.

Read full topic
